channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- UrbanCode Deploy
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- UrbanCode Deploy

item.title: CVE-2023-47161|2024-06-07T16:01:03.288Z -- ibm -- urbancode%20deploy
item.description: IBM UrbanCode Deploy (UCD) 7.1 through 7.1.2.14, 7.2 through 7.2.3.7, and 7.3 through 7.3.2.2 may mishandle input validation of an uploaded archive file leading to a denial of service due to resource exhaustion. IBM X-Force ID: 270799.
